messages.body: Apple Planning News Subscription Service Based On Recent Acquisition http://ow.ly/xX8d30jxCCu $AAPL

links.title: Apple News Subscription Service Planned From Texture Acquisition
links.description: Apple ( AAPL) reportedly plans to offer a news subscription service in an upgraded version of its Apple News app sometime within the next year. The service will come from integrating the recently acquired digital magazine app Texture into Apple News, Bloomberg reported Tuesday.

messages.body: $NFLX $FB $AAPL $GOOGL $AMZN $MSFT $WMT $IBM $EBAY $DIS $CAT $BA https://www.cnbc.com/2018/04/17/amazon-would-be-winner-if-internet-tax-law-reversed-grover-norquist.html The same argument can be made vs bigger corps...

links.title: Amazon would be big winner if internet tax law reversed: Anti-tax crusader Grover Norquist
links.description: If the U.S. Supreme Court decides to let states collect sales tax on out-of-state retailers, it would harm small business to the benefit of big companies, like Amazon, anti-tax crusader Grover Norquist told CNBC on Tuesday. The justices heard arguments on the issue Tuesday.
